I couldn't believe the price!! These movies are $50 in the local store. I searched on here thinking I might find them a few dollars off, but what a deal I got here! These movies are great for family watching. There is something for my son to enjoy and something for the parents as well. It had been a while since I had seen them, and I found myself laughing quite a bit. It was enjoyable for the whole family. Get them here, you won't find a better deal anywhere!

This isn't a review of the movies themselves but what is included. I bought this the other day thinking that the digital versions were included or at least a code to get the digital versions. Recently they took out the Digital version from this edition. So I'm returning this because already have it on DVD and was mainly buying it to obtain the digital versions since it was cheaper than buying the digital versions alone. So if you want the Blu Ray or DVD version only, go for it. If you were wanting the digital downloads don't bother.

So disappointed I read reviews that made me think this set included the digital copies. (As we all know Amazon descriptions are rarely comprehensive nor accurate.) Regardless, I wanted to let future purchasers know - DO NOT EXPECT the digital copy codes.
I received my movies with a busted up case. The dvds work, but the case is destroyed. Kinda pointless to buy them all as a collective set, if they cant even remain together in their package.

While I love the shrek movies, my love for them has no place here in this review. The case that these movies came in sucks. The plastic inserts that hold the DVDs came broken and you know how when you put a DVD in you hear a click from the center part fitting into the hole? It does not do that- the discs don't stick in there. When it came to me, none of the DVDs were stuck in properly but floating around in the case and were partially scratched. Just horrible case. if you are going to take them out and put them in a DVD binder then you might be alright, but long- term, this dvd case is not good.
Arrived on time and undamaged. I'm very pleased with this purchase!

All 4 Shrek movies that we know and love, in one place, for a very good price. Each movie comes on its own Blu-ray Disc, and is presented with fantastic visual quality and mixed in 7.1 audio. In addition, HD digital copies are included that link with Movies Anywhere! Woohoo!

I had forgotten how funny these movies are! Thankfully our oldest daughter, now 18, collects movies and asked for this one as a gift. I was happy to get it for her of course. She then insisted that we watch the 4 movies as a family and we jumped in. The younger kids, our toddler even, loved them too! It hadn't occurred to me that some of our children hadn't even seen these yet. Worth adding to your collection!

This movie set is perfect! And its a great bargain. I will never grow tired of rewatching these movies. We will be enjoying movie nights full of laughter... and in the morning Im making waffles!

Funny Movies!!

So there I was, roaming the streets of Ho Chi Minh City on Winter Break 2017. Suddenly, a legion on naked mole rats begin stampeding down the street right at me.  Im talking like at least ten or twenty thousand naked mole rats.  I began to run, but the mole rats were gaining on me.  I took a couple swift turns, and I thought Id lost them.  I stumbled into a back alley, where a lady offers to read my palm. I was reluctant at first, but at last I obliged (When in Ho Chi Minh City, amirite!?). She proceeds to tell me that I have 19 days to live. At first I was crushed... but in the words of George W. Bush, through my tears, I saw opportunity. I knew how I wanted to spend my last 19 days on this earth: watching all the Shrek movies on loop. Well let me tell you, Im on day 8 (of 19) and man, these movies get better every time!

The movies were great. It was the first time my 2 year old has ever sat through and watched something. I actually forgot how funny Shrek was. BUT... Each DVD had an issue. Maybe it's an isolated box set issue but each movie had a section that froze and then jumped ahead about 5 to 10 seconds. This happened in both DVD players I tried for ALL FOUR MOVIES. It was rather annoying. It was a great price for what you get. And being realistic I'll probably watch them only a couple times more. They were good but I also got irritated for a couple moments with each. So, I guess I got my money's worth out of them.

Because of the way the DVD case itself is made the discs came loose in shipping and got a little scratched. Nothing wrong with the seller or the movies, but in this 4 disc case the movies are back to back, and don't have their own section. It is not a great way to package. I won't get a cheap set like this again.

Great DVD set. It comes in a nice sleeve that holds a slightly larger than average DVD box. The box has two inserts that hold the four discs. There is no internal artwork that some of the more high end movie sets have like the Lord Of The Rings box set.

Overall it's a solid buy. Great family fun (with some added adult humor) that will surely bring about some hearty laughs!

The Shrek movies have always been a favorite so I decided to purchase the bundle. The DVD packaging was unopened and brand new. Couldn't have found the collection for a better price anywhere else!

Only 3 of the 4 DVDs will play. The 4th movie won't play regardless of what I try. I'll take it out and put one of the other three in and they all play without any issues. I bought this mainly for the 4th movie.
Love it
Perfect thank you

I bought this when it was $15 plus my free PRIME shipping. How can you possibly beat that? It's compact, simple, no-frills packaging and all 4 movies are presented neatly in a case about the width of a single DVD (with an attractive jacket) which I personally prefer as I appreciate the space saving. I hadn't seen the movies when I bought this, but have since watched them with my baby girl and enjoyed them immensely. I'm not a huge animation fan, but this definitely qualifies as one of the best animated movie series that I've seen - right up there with "Madagascar". I would recommend this to pretty much anyone - it's a definite must-have for all parents with kids of any age and of course, all Shrek fanatics. It's hours of kid friendly entertainment. Great service from Amazon, as always. You can't go wrong with this one!
Perfect.

The reason for the three (3) stars; The only draw back is the misleading advertisement to get to get HD download for computers and tablets. The code provided for the digital download is for either streaming (Vudu) or Ultra violet for download not both. The Digital files are not included on the two (2) DVDs. You must register with the codes provided on Vudu and Ultra Violet in the same process. You don't have an option to just register for the download via Ultra Violet.

To be honest I bought this on Ebay. But I love Amazon and just wanted to clarify something. When I was trying to look up the product I wanted to see if it was all 4 movies or if it was just some of them with bonus material. Especially since there is another blueray box that also says it has all 4 movies but its more expensive. Anyways I opened this product yesterday and was very happy to see shrek, shrek 2, shrek the third, and shrek forrver after. I don't know how the other box set is different besides being more expensive.

Honestly, these are pretty much just the DVDs copied onto bluray disks. I was looking forward to not having the Kung Fu Panda and MegaMind previews, but looks like I can't escape. The picture quality is noticeably better, at least to me. Plus it is nice to have the digital copies. I am also a fan of having all movies in one case. I own too many movies, so space is a hige thing. Any movie series that is in one case vs several is always a fantastic thing. Would 99% recommend this. 1% is lost for the previews that have gotten very annoying over the years.
Shrek is funny, but the jokes are geared more for adults than toddlers.  My kids are super interested in it, we'll try again in a couple years.  In the meantime, I think its funny!
